snippet: The extension of the interim agreement will maintain a freeze on much of Iran’s nuclear program in return for modest sanctions relief while negotiators continue to meet.

byline.contributor: Contributing line for Jonathan Weisman in Washington

lead_paragraph: The extension of the interim agreement will maintain a freeze on much of Iran’s nuclear program in return for modest sanctions relief while negotiators continue to meet.

headline.main: Interim Agreement With Iran Is Extended as Negotiations Continue
